trans-unit.source: Enables a non-control component to emulate the data-binding behavior of a Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用非控制項元件，模擬 Windows Forms 控制項的資料繫結行為。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> contains a reference to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent> owner through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindableComponent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>包含參考其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>擁有者透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindableComponent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class implements this interface, so if your bindable component inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, you do not need to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別會實作這個介面，因此，如果可繫結元件繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，您不需要實作這個介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of currency managers for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" /> 的 Currency 管理員集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of data-binding objects for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent" /> 的資料繫結物件集合。
